lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Sunday about the Yankees’ 6-4 victory over Toronto misidentified the right fielder who overran a run-scoring bloop hit in the fourth inning by John McDonald of the Blue Jays. It was Eric Hinske, not his teammate Nick Swisher.
